00065 int clUnstructured3D::CreateInitialGrid(void)
00066 {
00067   try
00068   {
00069     int entry;
00070 
00071     // First setup nodes of enbounding box
00072     entry=0;
00073 //    entry+=AddNode(-20.0, -20.0, -20.0);
00074 //    entry+=AddNode(+20.0, -20.0, -20.0);
00075 //    entry+=AddNode(+20.0, +20.0, -20.0);
00076 //    entry+=AddNode(-20.0, +20.0, -20.0);
00077 //    entry+=AddNode(-20.0, -20.0, +20.0);
00078 //    entry+=AddNode(+20.0, -20.0, +20.0);
00079 //    entry+=AddNode(+20.0, +20.0, +20.0);
00080 //    entry+=AddNode(-20.0, +20.0, +20.0);
00081 
00082     entry+=AddNode(-2.0, -2.0, -2.0);
00083     entry+=AddNode(+2.0, -2.0, -2.0);
00084     entry+=AddNode(+2.0, +2.0, -2.0);
00085     entry+=AddNode(-2.0, +2.0, -2.0);
00086     entry+=AddNode(-2.0, -2.0, +2.0);
00087     entry+=AddNode(+2.0, -2.0, +2.0);
00088     entry+=AddNode(+2.0, +2.0, +2.0);
00089     entry+=AddNode(-2.0, +2.0, +2.0);
00090 
00091     if(entry!=36)
00092     {
00093       char message[MESLEN];
00094       sprintf(message, "Entry total for nodes does not match.\n  TOTAL=%d [36]", entry);
00095       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "CreateInitialGrid", message);
00096     }
00097 
00098     // Setup the elements
00099     entry=0;
00100     {int nodes[]={-1, 6, 8, 7}; int faces[]={16, -1, -1, -1};
00101     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 1
00102 
00103     {int nodes[]={-1, 5, 8, 6}; int faces[]={15, -1, -1, -1};
00104     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 2
00105 
00106     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 8, 5}; int faces[]={15, -1, -1, -1};
00107     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 3
00108 
00109     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 4, 8}; int faces[]={14, -1, -1, -1};
00110     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 4
00111 
00112     {int nodes[]={-1, 4, 3, 8}; int faces[]={14, -1, -1, -1};
00113     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 5
00114 
00115     {int nodes[]={-1, 3, 7, 8}; int faces[]={16, -1, -1, -1};
00116     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 6
00117 
00118     {int nodes[]={-1, 3, 6, 7}; int faces[]={16, -1, -1, -1};
00119     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 7
00120 
00121     {int nodes[]={-1, 2, 6, 3}; int faces[]={13, -1, -1, -1};
00122     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 8
00123 
00124     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 5, 6}; int faces[]={15, -1, -1, -1};
00125     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 9
00126 
00127     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 6, 2}; int faces[]={13, -1, -1, -1};
00128     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 10
00129 
00130     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 3, 4}; int faces[]={14, -1, -1, -1};
00131     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 11
00132 
00133     {int nodes[]={-1, 1, 2, 3}; int faces[]={13, -1, -1, -1};
00134     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 12
00135 
00136     {int nodes[]={1, 2, 3, 6}; int faces[]={8, 17, 10, 12};
00137     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 13
00138 
00139     {int nodes[]={1, 3, 4, 8}; int faces[]={5, 4, 17, 11};
00140     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 14
00141 
00142     {int nodes[]={1, 5, 6, 8}; int faces[]={2, 17, 3, 9};
00143     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 15
00144 
00145     {int nodes[]={3, 6, 7, 8}; int faces[]={1, 6, 17, 7};
00146     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 16
00147 
00148     {int nodes[]={1, 3, 8, 6}; int faces[]={16, 15, 13, 14};
00149     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 17
00150 
00151     if(entry!=153)
00152     {
00153       char message[MESLEN];
00154       sprintf(message, "Entry total for elements does not match.\n  TOTAL=%d [153]", entry);
00155       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "CreateInitialGrid", message);
00156     }
00157 
00158     // Protect Halo Nodes
00159     for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00160     {
00161       clNode3D *theNode = GetNodePointer(n);
00162       theNode->SetProtection();
00163     }
00164 
00165     // Protect Halo cells
00166     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00167     {
00168       clTetrahedron *theElement = GetElementPointer(e);
00169       if(e<12)
00170       {
00171         theElement->SetHalo();
00172       }
00173       else
00174       {
00175         theElement->ResetHalo();
00176       }
00177     }
00178 
00179     CheckGrid();
00180   }
00181 
00182   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00183   {
00184     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CreateInitialGrid");
00185     throw EX;
00186   }
00187 
00188   return(GetNumberElements());
00189 }
00190 
00191 void clUnstructured3D::DeleteInitialGrid()
00192 {
00193   try
00194   {
00195     // Delete the initial nodes
00196     for(int nodeID=1; nodeID<9; nodeID++)
00197     {
00198       int       nodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(nodeID);
00199       clNode3D *node      = GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00200 
00201       // Delete all elements tha contain this node
00202       while(node->GetNumberElements()>0)
00203       {
00204         int elementID = node->GetElementID(0);
00205 
00206         // Identify all neighbour elements as boundary cells
00207         int            elementIndex = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00208         clTetrahedron *element      = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00209 
00210         for(int neighbourIndex=0; neighbourIndex<element->GetNumberFaces(); neighbourIndex++)
00211         {
00212           int neighbourID = element->GetNeighbourID(neighbourIndex);
00213           if(neighbourID!=-1)
00214           {
00215             int            neighbourEntry = GetElementIndex(neighbourID);
00216             clTetrahedron *neighbour      = GetElementPointer(neighbourEntry);
00217 
00218             neighbour->SetBoundary();
00219           }
00220         }
00221 
00222         DeleteElement(elementID);
00223       }
00224 
00225       DeleteNode(nodeID);
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00230   {
00231     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::DeleteInitialGrid");
00232     throw EX;
00233   }
00234 }
00235 
00236 int clUnstructured3D::FindEnclosingElement(const clNode3D *node)
00237 {
00238   //
00239   // IN : pointer to new node
00240   // OUT: elementID = ID of the element enclosing the new node
00241   //
00242 
00243   int            elementID        = -1;
00244   int            elementIndex;
00245   clTetrahedron *element;
00246 
00247   try
00248   {
00249     //Start with last element
00250     int returnID         = GetElementPointer(GetNumberElements()-1)->GetNumberID();
00251     int endlessLoopCheck = -1;
00252 
00253     while(elementID != returnID)
00254     {
00255       if(endlessLoopCheck == returnID)
00256       {
00257         // Programme is hanging in an endless loop
00258         char message[MESLEN];
00259         sprintf(message, "Programme hanging in an ENDLESS LOOP\n    1ST ELEMENTID = %d\n    2ND ELEMENTID = %d", endlessLoopCheck, elementID);
00260         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00261       }
00262 
00263       endlessLoopCheck = elementID;
00264       elementID        = returnID;
00265       elementIndex     = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00266       element          = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00267 
00268       if(element->IsHalo())
00269       {
00270         // Current tetrahedron is a halo cell, search for neighbour
00271         int f=0;
00272         while(f<element->GetNumberFaces() && element->GetNeighbourID(f)==-1)
00273         {
00274           f++;
00275         }
00276 
00277         if(f>=element->GetNumberFaces())
00278         {
00279           char message[MESLEN];
00280           sprintf(message, "Could not find valid neighbour for halo cell.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", element->GetNumberID());
00281           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00282         }
00283 
00284         // Return ID of one of the neighbouring tetrahedrons
00285         returnID    = element->GetNeighbourID(f);
00286       }
00287       else
00288       {
00289         // Check if node is in current element
00290         returnID = element->IsNodeInElement(node);
00291       }
00292     }
00293 
00294     if(element->IsHalo())
00295     {
00296       char string[25];
00297       sprintf(string, "Found element is HaloCell\n ID = %d", elementID);
00298       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindEnclosingElement", string);
00299     }
00300   }
00301 
00302   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00303   {
00304     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::FindEnclosingElement");
00305     throw EX;
00306   }
00307 
00308   return(elementID);
00309 }
00310 
00311 void clUnstructured3D::FindAffectedElements_Simple(const int theElementID, tpList<int> *deleteList, tpList<int> *neighbourList, tpList<int> *neighbourFaceList)
00312 {
00313   //
00314   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00315   //  OUT: deleteList        = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00316   //       neighbourList     = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00317   //       neighbourFaceList = list containing the entries of the affected neighbour faces.
00318   //
00319 
00320   try
00321   {
00322     // Retrieve the element
00323     int            theElementIndex = GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00324     clTetrahedron *theElement      = GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00325 
00326     // Add element to deleteList
00327     deleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00328 
00329     // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking
00330     for(int f=0; f<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00331     {
00332       int            theNeighbourID    = theElement->GetNeighbourID(f);
00333       int            theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00334       clTetrahedron* theNeighbour      = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00335 
00336       neighbourList->AddItem(theNeighbourID);
00337 
00338       for(int ff=0; ff<theNeighbour->GetNumberFaces(); ff++)
00339       {
00340         if(theNeighbour->GetNeighbourID(ff)==theElementID)
00341         {
00342           neighbourFaceList->AddItem(ff);
00343         }
00344       }
00345     }
00346 
00347   }
00348 
00349   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00350   {
00351     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::FindAffectedElements_Simple");
00352     throw EX;
00353   }
00354 }
00355 
00356 void clUnstructured3D::FindAffectedElements_Advanced(const int theElementID, const clNode3D *theNode, tpList<int> *theDeleteList, tpList<int> *theNeighbourList, tpList<int> *theFaceList)
00357 {
00358   //
00359   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00360   //       theNode           = pointer to the new node; for checking the In-Sphere Criterion
00361   //  OUT: theDeleteList     = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00362   //       theNeighbourList  = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00363   //       theFaceList       = list containg the indices of the affected neighbour faces (in neighbour system).
00364   //
00365 
00366   try
00367   {
00368     tpStack<int> searchStack;
00369     tpStack<int> faceStack;
00370 
00371     faceStack.Push(0);
00372     searchStack.Push(theElementID);
00373     while(!searchStack.IsEmpty())
00374     {
00375       // Pop from stack until stack is empty
00376       int theFaceIndex = faceStack.Pop();
00377       int theElementID = searchStack.Pop();
00378 
00379       // Create pointer to the popped element
00380       int            theElementIndex = GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00381       clTetrahedron *theElement      = GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00382 
00383       // Check if the node falls within the circum-sphere of the element
00384       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->InSphereCriterion(theNode))
00385       {
00386         // Check if element was already added to deleteList
00387         int i = theDeleteList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00388         if(i<0)
00389         {
00390           // Not yet added to deleteList; add element to deleteList
00391           theDeleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00392 
00393           // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking for In-Sphere criterion
00394           for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); n++)
00395           {
00396             int theNeighbourID = theElement->GetNeighbourID(n);
00397             if(theNeighbourID!=-1)
00398             {
00399               int            theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00400               clTetrahedron *theNeighbour      = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00401 
00402               searchStack.Push(theNeighbourID);
00403               faceStack.Push(theNeighbour->FindFaceIndex(theElementID));
00404             }
00405           }
00406         }
00407       }
00408       else
00409       {
00410         // This is an unaffected element (either haloCell or node does not fulfill inSphereCriterion)
00411         // Check if not already added to lists
00412         int i = theNeighbourList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00413         if((i<0) || ((i>=0)&&(theFaceList->GetItem(i)!=theFaceIndex)))
00414         {
00415           // Add to neighbourList
00416           theNeighbourList->AddItem(theElementID);
00417           theFaceList->AddItem(theFaceIndex);
00418         }
00419         else
00420         {
00421           // Strange, seems two elements fight for the same neighbour and same neighbour face
00422           char message[MESLEN];
00423           sprintf(message, "Duplicate entry in theNeighbourList/theFaceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    FACEENTRY = %d", theElementID, theFaceIndex);
00424           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00425         }
00426       }
00427     }
00428 
00429     // Perform a check
00430     if(theDeleteList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00431     {
00432       char message[MESLEN];
00433       sprintf(message, "Empty deleteList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00434       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00435     }
00436 
00437     if(theNeighbourList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00438     {
00439       char message[MESLEN];
00440       sprintf(message, "Empty neighbourList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00441       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00442     }
00443 
00444     if(theFaceList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00445     {
00446       char message[MESLEN];
00447       sprintf(message, "Empty faceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00448       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00449     }
00450   }
00451 
00452   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00453   {
00454     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::FindAffectedElements");
00455     throw EX;
00456   }
00457 }
00458 
00459 int clUnstructured3D::InsertNode(const clNode3D theNode)
00460 {
00461   //
00462   // IN : theNode   = the new node that must be inserted
00463   // OUT: theNodeID = the ID number of the newly inserted node
00464   //
00465 
00466   int theNodeID;
00467 
00468   try
00469   {
00470     tpList<int> theDeleteList;    // ID's of all elements to be deleted
00471     tpList<int> theNeighbourList; // ID's of all new neighbour elements
00472     tpList<int> theFaceList;      // Indices of affected neighbour faces
00473 
00474     // Find the affected elements
00475     int theElementID = FindEnclosingElement(&theNode);
00476     FindAffectedElements_Advanced(theElementID, &theNode, &theDeleteList, &theNeighbourList, &theFaceList);
00477 
00478     // Debug info
00479 //    cout << "Primary suspected element: " << theElementID << endl << endl;
00480 //
00481 //    cout << "Number of elements to be deleted: " << theDeleteList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00482 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00483 //    for(int i=0; i<theDeleteList.GetNumberItems(); i++) cout << theDeleteList(i) << " ";
00484 //    cout << endl << endl;
00485 //
00486 //    cout << "Number of neighbour elements: " << theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00487 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00488 //    for(int j=0; j<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); j++) cout << theNeighbourList(j) << " ";
00489 //    cout << endl << endl;
00490 //
00491 //    cout << "Faces are:" << endl;
00492 //    for(int k=0; k<theFaceList.GetNumberItems(); k++) cout << theFaceList(k) << " ";
00493 //    cout << endl << endl;
00494 
00495     // Delete all indicated elements
00496     for(int d=0; d<theDeleteList.GetNumberItems(); d++)
00497     {
00498       int dd = theDeleteList(d);
00499       DeleteElement(dd);
00500     }
00501 
00502     // Insert the new node
00503     theNodeID = AddNode(theNode);
00504 
00505     // Connect the new elements to the found neighbours
00506     tpList<int> theNewElementIDs;
00507     for(int n=0; n<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); n++)
00508     {
00509       int            theNeighbourID    = theNeighbourList(n);
00510       int            theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00511       clTetrahedron  *theNeighbour     = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00512 
00513       int theFaceNodes[3];
00514       int theNeighbourFaceIndex = theFaceList(n);
00515       theNeighbour->GetFaceNodes(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theFaceNodes);
00516 
00517       // Nodes can already be resolved, so fill
00518       int theNodeIDs[4];
00519       theNodeIDs[0] = theNodeID;
00520       theNodeIDs[1] = theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[2]);
00521       theNodeIDs[2] = theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[1]);
00522       theNodeIDs[3] = theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[0]);
00523 
00524       // Only 1 neighbour element is known, so rest is set to -1
00525       int theNeighbourIDs[] = {theNeighbourID, -1, -1, -1};
00526 
00527       // Create the new element
00528       int theNewElementID = AddElement(theNeighbourIDs, theNodeIDs);
00529       theNewElementIDs.AddItem(theNewElementID);
00530 
00531       // Make neighbour refer to the new element
00532       theNeighbour->SetNeighbourID(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theNewElementID);
00533 
00534       // Debug info
00535 //      cout << "Connecting " << theNewElementID << ".0 to element " << theNeighbourID << "." << theNeighbourFaceIndex << endl;
00536     }
00537 
00538     // Connect the new elements to each other
00539     ConnectNewElements(&theNewElementIDs);
00540   }
00541 
00542   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00543   {
00544     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::InsertNode");
00545     throw EX;
00546   }
00547 
00548   return(theNodeID);
00549 }
00550 
00551 void clUnstructured3D::ConnectNewElements(tpList<int> *newElementIDs)
00552 {
00553   //
00554   // IN : newElementIDs = pointer to list containing all newly created element
00555   // OUT: -
00556   //
00557 
00558   try
00559   {
00560     while(newElementIDs->GetNumberItems()!=0)
00561     {
00562       int            activeID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(0);
00563       int            activeIndex   = GetElementIndex(activeID);
00564       clTetrahedron* activeElement = GetElementPointer(activeIndex);
00565 
00566       // Clear from being haloCell
00567       activeElement->ResetHalo();
00568 
00569       // Check the number of already connected faces
00570 //      cout << endl;
00571 
00572       int numberConnected = 0;
00573       for(int f=0; f<activeElement->GetNumberFaces() ; f++)
00574       {
00575         if(activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f)!=-1)
00576         {
00577 //          cout << activeID << "." << f << " connected to " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f) << "     \t[EXISTING CONNECTION]" << endl;
00578           numberConnected++;
00579         }
00580       }
00581 
00582       // Delete element from list; not required anymore
00583       newElementIDs->DeleteItem(0);
00584 
00585       // Loop through remaining list to find neighbour
00586       int  i      = 0;
00587       bool succes = false;
00588       while(i<newElementIDs->GetNumberItems() && numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00589       {
00590         int            passiveID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(i);
00591         int            passiveIndex   = GetElementIndex(passiveID);
00592         clTetrahedron* passiveElement = GetElementPointer(passiveIndex);
00593 
00594         // Find neighbour face connnection
00595         int activeFace  = 0;
00596         int passiveFace = 0;
00597         succes = FindFaceConnection(activeID, passiveID, activeFace, passiveFace);
00598 
00599         if(succes && activeElement->GetNeighbourID(activeFace)==-1)
00600         {
00601           // Establish the connection
00602           activeElement->SetNeighbourID(activeFace, passiveID);
00603           passiveElement->SetNeighbourID(passiveFace, activeID);
00604 
00605           // Debug info
00606 //          cout << activeID << "." << activeFace << " connected to " << passiveID << "." << passiveFace << "     \t[NEW CONNECTION]" << endl;
00607 
00608           numberConnected++;
00609         }
00610 
00611         i++;
00612       }
00613 
00614       if(numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00615       {
00616         char message[MESLEN];
00617 //        for(int i=0; i<activeElement->GetNumberFaces(); i++) cout << "FACE " << i<< " CONNECTED TO " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(i) << endl;
00618         sprintf(message, "Could not establish a connection.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", activeID);
00619         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "ConnectNewElements", message);
00620       }
00621     }
00622   }
00623 
00624   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00625   {
00626     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::ConnectNewElements");
00627     throw EX;
00628   }
00629 }
00630 
00631 bool clUnstructured3D::FindFaceConnection(const int masterID, const int slaveID, int &masterFace, int &slaveFace)
00632 {
00633   //
00634   // IN : masterID   = ID of master element
00635   //      slaveID    = ID of slave element
00636   // OUT: masterFace = face entry of master element referring to slave element
00637   //      slaveFace  = face entry of slave element referring to master element
00638   // OUT: ret        = TRUE if a connection was found
00639   //                   FALSE if no connection was found
00640   //
00641 
00642   bool ret = false;
00643 
00644   try
00645   {
00646     // Find the element entries
00647     int masterEntry = GetElementIndex(masterID);
00648     int slaveEntry  = GetElementIndex(slaveID);
00649 
00650     // Retrieve the elements
00651     clTetrahedron *masterElement = GetElementPointer(masterEntry);
00652     clTetrahedron *slaveElement  = GetElementPointer(slaveEntry);
00653 
00654     // Loop through all faces of the master element
00655     masterFace=0;
00656     while(masterFace<masterElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00657     {
00658       // Retrieve the entries to the master face nodes
00659       int masterFaceNodes[masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00660       masterElement->GetFaceNodes(masterFace, masterFaceNodes);
00661 
00662       // Retrieve the ID's of the master face nodes
00663       int masterNodeIDs[masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00664       for(int n=0; n<masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); n++)
00665       {
00666         masterNodeIDs[n]=masterElement->GetNodeID(masterFaceNodes[n]);
00667       }
00668 
00669       // Loop through all faces of the slave element
00670       slaveFace=0;
00671       while(slaveFace<slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00672       {
00673         // Retrieve the entries to the slave face nodes
00674         int slaveFaceNodes[slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00675         slaveElement->GetFaceNodes(slaveFace, slaveFaceNodes);
00676 
00677         // Retrieve the ID's of the slave face nodes
00678         int slaveNodeIDs[slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00679         for(int nn=0; nn<slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); nn++)
00680         {
00681           slaveNodeIDs[nn]=slaveElement->GetNodeID(slaveFaceNodes[nn]);
00682         }
00683 
00684         // Check if the master face is equal to the slave face
00685         if(IsEqualFace(masterNodeIDs, slaveNodeIDs))
00686         {
00687           ret=true;
00688         }
00689 
00690         slaveFace++;
00691       }
00692 
00693       masterFace++;
00694     }
00695     slaveFace--;
00696     masterFace--;
00697 
00698     if(slaveFace>=slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() || masterFace>=masterElement->GetNumberFaces())
00699     {
00700       char message[MESLEN];
00701       sprintf(message, "Invalid face(s) found.\n    MASTERFACE = %d\n    SLAVEFACE  = %d", masterFace, slaveFace);
00702       throw clException("clUnstructured3D", "FindFaceConnection", message);
00703     }
00704   }
00705 
00706   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00707   {
00708     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::FindFaceConnection");
00709     throw EX;
00710   }
00711 
00712   return(ret);
00713 }
00714 
00715 bool clUnstructured3D::IsEqualFace(const int *masterNodeIDs, const int *slaveNodeIDs)
00716 {
00717   //
00718   // IN : masterNodeIDs = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the master face
00719   //      slaveNodeIDs  = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the slave face
00720   // OUT: ret = TRUE if current master face is equal to slave face
00721   //            FALSE if current master face is not equal to slave face
00722   //
00723 
00724   bool ret = false;
00725 
00726   try
00727   {
00728     int numberConnectedNodes=0;
00729 
00730     //TODO: Make more general instead of hardcoding '3' faceNodes
00731     for(int i=0; i<3; i++)
00732     {
00733       for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
00734       {
00735         if(masterNodeIDs[i]==slaveNodeIDs[j]) numberConnectedNodes++;
00736       }
00737     }
00738 
00739     //TODO: Make more general instead of hardcoding '3' faceNodes
00740     if(numberConnectedNodes==3) ret=true;
00741   }
00742 
00743   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00744   {
00745     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::IsEqualFace");
00746     throw EX;
00747   }
00748 
00749   return(ret);
00750 }
00751 
00752 void clUnstructured3D::CorrectGrid(void)
00753 {
00754   try
00755   {
00756     CorrectInSphereCriterion();
00757   }
00758 
00759   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00760   {
00761     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CorrectGrid");
00762     throw EX;
00763   }
00764 }
00765 
00766 void clUnstructured3D::CorrectInSphereCriterion(void)
00767 {
00768   try
00769   {
00770     int e = 0;
00771     while(e<GetNumberElements())
00772     {
00773       clTetrahedron* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00774 
00775       // Loop through all nodes
00776       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00777       {
00778         clNode3D* node = GetNodePointer(n);
00779 
00780         cout << "Checking node " << node->GetNumberID() << " against element " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00781 
00782         bool repairElement = true;
00783         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsHalo();
00784         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsElementNode(node->GetNumberID());
00785         repairElement = repairElement &&  element->InSphereCriterion(node);
00786 
00787         if(repairElement)
00788         {
00789           clNode3D    centroid  = element->GetCentroid();
00790           clNode3D   *lastNode  = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
00791           int         newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00792 
00793           clNode3D    newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
00794           newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
00795 
00796           // Debugging
00797           cout << "Corrected element: " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00798 
00799           // Restart at beginning
00800           e=-1;
00801           n=GetNumberNodes();
00802         }
00803       }
00804 
00805       e++;
00806     }
00807   }
00808 
00809   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00810   {
00811     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CorrectInSphereCriterion");
00812     throw EX;
00813   }
00814 }
00815 
00816 bool clUnstructured3D::CheckGrid(void)
00817 {
00818   bool ret=true;
00819 
00820   try
00821   {
00822     // Check initial grid
00823     ret = ret && CheckElementConnections();
00824     ret = ret && CheckNodeConnections();
00825     ret = ret && CheckElementVolumes();
00826     ret = ret && CheckInSphereCriterion();
00827   }
00828 
00829   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00830   {
00831     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CheckGrid");
00832     throw EX;
00833   }
00834 
00835   return(ret);
00836 }
00837 
00838 bool clUnstructured3D::CheckElementVolumes(void)
00839 {
00840   bool ret=true;
00841 
00842   try
00843   {
00844     // Loop through all elements
00845     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00846     {
00847       clTetrahedron* theElement = GetElementPointer(e);
00848 
00849       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->GetVolume()<=PRECISION)
00850       {
00851         ret=false;
00852 
00853         char message[MESLEN];
00854         sprintf(message, "Detected element with zero or negative volume.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElement->GetNumberID());
00855         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "CheckElementVolumes", message);
00856       }
00857     }
00858   }
00859 
00860   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00861   {
00862     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CheckElementVolumes");
00863     throw EX;
00864   }
00865 
00866   return(ret);
00867 }
00868 
00869 bool clUnstructured3D::CheckInSphereCriterion(void)
00870 {
00871   bool ret=true;
00872 
00873   try
00874   {
00875     // Loop through all elements
00876     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00877     {
00878       clTetrahedron* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00879 
00880       // Loop through all nodes
00881       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00882       {
00883         clNode3D* node = GetNodePointer(n);
00884 
00885         // Check node is not part of element
00886         int  i     = 0;
00887         bool found = false;
00888         while(i<element->GetNumberNodes() && !found)
00889         {
00890           if(element->GetNodeID(i) == node->GetNumberID())
00891           {
00892             found = true;
00893           }
00894 
00895           i++;
00896         }
00897 
00898         if(!element->IsHalo() && !found && element->InSphereCriterion(node))
00899         {
00900           ret=false;
00901 
00902           char message[MESLEN];
00903           sprintf(message, "Detected node breaching in-sphere criterion.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    NODEID      = %d", element->GetNumberID(), node->GetNumberID());
00904           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "CheckInSphereCriterion", message);
00905         }
00906       }
00907     }
00908   }
00909 
00910   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00911   {
00912     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CheckInSphereCriterion");
00913     throw EX;
00914   }
00915 
00916   return(ret);
00917 }
00918 
00919 bool clUnstructured3D::CheckTotalVolume(void)
00920 {
00921   bool   ret=true;
00922   double totalVolume = 0.0;
00923 
00924   try
00925   {
00926     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00927     {
00928       clTetrahedron* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00929       if(!element->IsHalo())
00930       {
00931         totalVolume = totalVolume + element->GetVolume();
00932       }
00933     }
00934 
00935     if(fabs(totalVolume - (double)(64)) > PRECISION)
00936     {
00937       ret=false;
00938 
00939       char message[MESLEN];
00940       sprintf(message, "Total volume incorrect.\n    VOLUME = %f [64.00]", totalVolume);
00941       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "CheckTotalVolume", message);
00942     }
00943   }
00944 
00945   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00946   {
00947     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::CheckTotalVolume");
00948     throw EX;
00949   }
00950 
00951   return(ret);
00952 }

00968 /***************************************************************
00969 ***
00970 ***   Performing Node Characteristic Operation
00971 ***
00972 **/
00973 
00974 int clUnstructured3D::AddNode(const double x, const double y, const double z)
00975 {
00976   //
00977   // IN : x         = x-coordinate of new node
00978   //      y         = y-coordinate of new node
00979   //      z         = z-coordinate of new node
00980   // OUT: newNodeID = ID of new node
00981   //
00982 
00983   int newNodeID = 1;
00984 
00985   try
00986   {
00987     if(GetNumberNodes()>0)
00988     {
00989       clNode3D  *lastNode = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
00990       newNodeID           = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00991     }
00992 
00993     clNode3D newNode(newNodeID, x, y, z);
00994     AddNode(newNode);
00995   }
00996 
00997   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00998   {
00999     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::AddNode");
01000     throw EX;
01001   }
01002 
01003   return(newNodeID);
01004 }
01005 
01006 int clUnstructured3D::AddNode(const double coord[3])
01007 {
01008   //
01009   // IN : coord[3]  = coordinates of new node
01010   // OUT: newNodeID = ID of new node
01011   //
01012   int newNodeID = 1;
01013 
01014   try
01015   {
01016     newNodeID = AddNode(coord[0], coord[1], coord[2]);
01017   }
01018 
01019   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01020   {
01021     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::AddNode");
01022     throw EX;
01023   }
01024 
01025   return(newNodeID);
01026 }

01028 /***************************************************************
01029 ***
01030 ***  Perforing Element Characteristic Operations
01031 ***
01032 **/
01033 
01034 //TODO: Make more general instead programming '4' etc.
01035 int clUnstructured3D::AddElement(const int faces[4], const int nodes[4])
01036 {
01037   //
01038   // IN : faces         = IDs of neighbouring elements
01039   //      nodes         = IDs of nodes
01040   // OUT: newElementID  = ID of new element
01041   //
01042 
01043   int newElementID = 1;
01044 
01045   try
01046   {
01047     newElementID = AddElement(faces[0], faces[1], faces[2], faces[3], nodes[0], nodes[1], nodes[2], nodes[3]);
01048   }
01049 
01050   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01051   {
01052     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::AddElement");
01053     throw EX;
01054   }
01055 
01056   return(newElementID);
01057 }
01058 
01059 //TODO: Make more general instead programming '4' etc.
01060 int clUnstructured3D::AddElement(const int face1, const int face2, const int face3, const int face4,
01061                                  const int node1, const int node2, const int node3, const int node4)
01062 {
01063   //
01064   // IN : face1         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V2, V3, V4
01065   //      face2         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V1, V4, V3
01066   //      face3         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V1, V2, V4
01067   //      face4         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V1, V3, V2
01068   //      node1         = ID of node1
01069   //      node2         = ID of node2
01070   //      node3         = ID of node3
01071   //      node4         = ID of node4
01072   // OUT: newElementID  = ID of new element
01073   //
01074 
01075   int newElementID = 1;
01076 
01077   try
01078   {
01079     if(GetNumberElements()>0)
01080     {
01081       clTetrahedron * lastElement = GetElementPointer(GetNumberElements()-1);
01082       newElementID                = lastElement->GetNumberID()+1;
01083     }
01084 
01085     clTetrahedron newElement(this, newElementID);
01086 
01087     newElement.SetNeighbourID(0, face1);
01088     newElement.SetNeighbourID(1, face2);
01089     newElement.SetNeighbourID(2, face3);
01090     newElement.SetNeighbourID(3, face4);
01091 
01092     newElement.SetNodeID(0, node1);
01093     newElement.SetNodeID(1, node2);
01094     newElement.SetNodeID(2, node3);
01095     newElement.SetNodeID(3, node4);
01096 
01097     AddElement(newElement);
01098 
01099     // Add elementID to the nodes of this new element
01100     for(int n=0; n<newElement.GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01101     {
01102       int theNodeID = newElement.GetNodeID(n);
01103       if(theNodeID!=-1)
01104       {
01105         int       theNodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(theNodeID);
01106         clNode3D *theNode      = GetNodePointer(theNodeIndex);
01107 
01108         theNode->AddElementID(newElementID);
01109       }
01110 
01111       // TODO: Do similarly for neighbouring elements?
01112     }
01113 
01114 
01115   }
01116 
01117   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01118   {
01119     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::AddElement");
01120     throw EX;
01121   }
01122 
01123   return(newElementID);
01124 }
01125 
01126 void clUnstructured3D::RandomCentroidInsertion(const int numberInsertions)
01127 {
01128   try
01129   {
01130     srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
01131     //srand((unsigned)0);
01132 
01133     for(int i=0; i<numberInsertions; i++)
01134     {
01135       // Select a random tetrahedron - but not a halo tetrahedron
01136       int index = rand() % GetNumberElements();
01137 
01138       clTetrahedron *theElement = GetElementPointer(index);
01139       if(!theElement->IsHalo())
01140       {
01141         clNode3D  centroid  = theElement->GetCentroid();
01142         clNode3D *lastNode  = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
01143         int       newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
01144 
01145         clNode3D  newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
01146         newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
01147       }
01148       else
01149       {
01150         // Retry randomisation
01151         i--;
01152       }
01153     }
01154   }
01155 
01156   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01157   {
01158     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::RandomCentroidInsertion3D");
01159     throw EX;
01160   }
01161 }

01176 
01177 void clUnstructured3D::DumpGrid(const char* fileName)
01178 {
01179   try
01180   {
01181     fstream fout;
01182     fout.open(fileName, ios::out);
01183     fout.precision(3);
01184     if (fout.good())
01185     {
01186       // Dump all nodes with the element-references
01187       fout << "NODE ID;COORDINATES;;" << endl;
01188       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01189       {
01190         clNode3D           *node  = GetNodePointer(n);
01191         tpMatrix<double>  coord = node->GetCoordinates();
01192         fout << node->GetNumberID() << ";";
01193         fout << coord(1,1) << ";" << coord(2,1) << ";" << coord(3,1) << ";" ;
01194         //fout << coord(1,1) << ";" << coord(1,2) << ";" << coord(1,3) << ";" ;
01195         fout << endl;
01196       }
01197       fout << endl;
01198 
01199       // Dump all elements with neighbour-references and node-references
01200       fout << "ELEMENT ID;VOLUME;NEIGHBOUR REFERENCES;;;;NODE REFERENCES;;;" << endl;
01201       for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
01202       {
01203         clTetrahedron *element = GetElementPointer(e);
01204         if(!element->IsHalo())
01205         {
01206           fout << element->GetNumberID() << ";";
01207           fout << element->GetVolume() << ";";
01208           for(int nb=0; nb<element->GetNumberFaces(); nb++)
01209           {
01210             fout << element->GetNeighbourID(nb) << ";";
01211           }
01212 
01213           for(int no=0; no<element->GetNumberNodes(); no++)
01214           {
01215             fout << element->GetNodeID(no) << ";";
01216           }
01217           fout << endl;
01218         }
01219       }
01220       fout << endl;
01221 
01222       fout.close();
01223     }
01224     else
01225     {
01226       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured3D", "DumpGrid", "Could not open dump-file.");
01227     }
01228   }
01229 
01230   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01231   {
01232     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::DumpGrid");
01233     throw EX;
01234   }
01235 }
